summary:
Coinbase fell 8% to an all-time low of $32.65 in a slow day of trading alongside the S&P 500 and Nasdaq.
Volume was low in markets, with investors likely taking much-deserved time off.
author: Christiana Loureiro
The Block
title: Coinbase all-time low kicks off slow holiday week
content: Coinbase fell 8% to an all-time low of $32.65 in a slow day of trading alongside the S&P 500 and Nasdaq.
Other crypto-related stocks fell, including Galaxy Digital and MicroStrategy.
Bitcoin dropped 1.1% over the past 24 hours, while ether declined 0.7%.
